script:
FireBest DissablePreCollapseFacilityWhenNeeded 
SalvageGenFromSeed
ShowDefaultVisual
FireBest SalvageCheckHostile
text: Captain, we have arrived at our destination. According to those coordinates we are now at the main facility, where Project Cheron was conducted. We will be descending our shuttles soon,
As your fleet moves in closer, sensors detect multiple contacts rising up from the depths of the planet. Their design does not match any ship from our Tripad
Now, that defenders has been defeated  our path to facility is cleared

options:
0:explore_theta:Send a salvage team down to the facility
100:defaultLeave:Leave
